content.raw: not, is not being used, deleted.

Looks like `Scene's VisualAt` function is done but the selection buffer is not currently used? Could you also integrate selection buffer?  thanks

It's mainly used by the [UserCamera](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/8a59b5f0f0b9bda21ee905098b47900da492ba9c/gazebo/rendering/UserCamera.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) class in gazebo. We could probably just integrate it in ignition rendering's `OgreCamera` class.

Selection buffer is more efficient than ray queries and more suitable for heavy use by the gui.
content.html:
Looks like Scene's VisualAt function is done but the selection buffer is not currently used? Could you also integrate selection buffer? thanks

It's mainly used by the UserCamera class in gazebo. We could probably just integrate it in ignition rendering's OgreCamera class.

Selection buffer is more efficient than ray queries and more suitable for heavy use by the gui.

You can put them in `src/ogre/media` directory
